c3py.tooltip¶

class c3py.tooltip.Tooltip¶

Manipulate the chart’s tooltip.

tooltip_format = c3py.tooltip.TooltipFormat
hide()¶

Hide the tooltip on the chart.

Returns:
Return type:None
ungroup()¶

Ungroup the tooltips. When hovering at a point on a data series, only that series’ tooltip will be shown, instead of all series’ tooltips.

Returns:
Return type:None
class c3py.tooltip.TooltipFormat¶

Manipulate the format of the tooltip.

set_title(title)¶

Set the title of the tooltip. The variable ‘x’ can be used to refer to the x value at the tooltip.

Parameters:title (str) – The title of the tooltip.
Returns:
Return type:None

Example

chart.tooltip.tooltip_format.set_title('"value on x-axis = " + x')
